content: pattern language english us crochet terminology is used digital file that contains detailed instructions for making an amigurumi inspired by potions from the d&d rpg the pattern is part of the meu jeito nerd 2023 project artisan support through several contact channels finished size approx 12cm/5inches using 2 5mm hook pattern level intermediate craft time approx 3-4 hours each #rpg #dungeonsanddragons
